snippet: In China, women tired of waiting for public toilets have been holding demonstrations demanding that more be built, speaking to a broader issue of inadequate sanitation facilities across the country.
abstract: Beijing Journal; women in China, tired of waiting for public toilets, have been holding demonstrations demanding that more be built, speaking to a broader issue of inadequate sanitation facilities across the country.
lead_paragraph: In China, women tired of waiting for public toilets have been holding demonstrations demanding that more be built, speaking to a broader issue of inadequate sanitation facilities across the country.

headline.seo: Chinese Women Demand More Public Toilets
headline.main: For Chinese Women, a Basic Need, and Few Places to Attend to It
headline.print_headline: For Chinese Women, a Basic Need, and Few Places to Attend to It
